item.title: Define your motivation, do your research (& eat your vegetables)
item.description: TL;DR: Domain knowledge is more important than any code you will write. So become fluent(ish) in the problem space by researching it before you waste your time programing.

item.title: Build a data feature that matters.
item.description: TL;DR: To become maximally effective, all data scientists should know the flow of producing & maintaining a data product to better understand how to fit their peice into the puzzle.

item.title: Hi, I'm Austin.
item.description: Nice to finally meet you, it's been too long. First, thank you for taking the time to read some of the things I’ve written. Second, here are a few things about me.
